column4: I'm sitting next to a laptop that I can't get to go online because I can't see the network icon in the notification area
it's running Intrepid.  When me or Jess are logged in, we see the icon and we can get online, but Libby is logged in and she can't see it
zirroday: another user is running it
does the other user need to log out altogether, or can we run two instances of nm-applet?
you should be able to use two together, but not sure
it says it couldn't acquire the NetworkManagerUserSettings as it is already takne
its a confirmed bug and is being worked on
however I can understand its a pain, you might want to look at the other bugs (particularly the gnome one) for possible workarounds
logging out both users then logging back in agian
